# relyingPartyIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A string that identifies this identity’s relying party.

## Declaration

```swift
var relyingPartyIdentifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

A passkey credential identity reports its `relyingPartyIdentifier` value as its [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASCredentialIdentity/serviceIdentifier].
title: relyingPartyIdentifier
